typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AnswerInfo
typeDescription.description: Meta-information on the generated candidate answer

featureDescription.name: canonText
featureDescription.description: Syntactically canonical form of the answer (without leading/trailing interpunction and the- and such)

featureDescription.name: features
featureDescription.description: A set of features of this answer. Unmatched features should simply not be present, and order does not matter. Duplicates should NOT appear.

featureDescription.name: isLast
featureDescription.description: Whether this is the last candidate answer CAS

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.PassageForParsing
typeDescription.description: A passage on which a parser should be run

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AnswerFeature
typeDescription.description: A feature matched on this answer. This type is for sub-classing to particular features.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: Feature value. Unmatched features are assumed 0. Ideally, the feature value should be in the interval of [0,1], but this is not enforced.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_Occurences
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Number of times this answer has been generated

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ResultLogScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Log-score (by solr) of the result that produced the supporting passage

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_PassageLogScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Log-score of the passage that produced this answer

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_OriginPsg
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: 1 if the origin of this answer is an in-document passage

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_OriginPsgFirst
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: 1 if the origin of this answer is the first passage of document (often a blurb packed with is-a relationships information)

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_OriginPsgNP
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: 1 if the origin of this answer is a noun phrase parsed in a passage

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_OriginPsgNE
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: 1 if the origin of this answer is a named entity matched in a passage (TODO: also distinguish the type of matched named entity?)

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_OriginPsgNPByLATSubj
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: 1 if the origin of this answer is a noun phrase parsed in a passage that is object of a subject that matches question LAT ("What is critical mass of X?" -> "Critical mass is ***")

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_OriginPsgSurprise
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: 1 if the origin of this answer is a passage that does not end with a question clue

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_OriginDocTitle
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: 1 if the origin of this answer is a document title

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_OriginDBpRelation
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: 1 if the origin of this answer is a DBpedia property.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_OriginConcept
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: 1 if the origin of this answer is a document corresponding to in-question concept

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_OriginConceptBySubject
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: 1 if the origin of this answer is a document corresponding to in-question concept subduing question subject clue

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_OriginConceptByLAT
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: 1 if the origin of this answer is a document corresponding to in-question concept subduing question focus clue

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_OriginConceptByNE
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: 1 if the origin of this answer is a document corresponding to in-question concept subduing question NamedEntity clue

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_OriginMultiple
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: 1 if this answer was generated by multiple orthogonal annotators.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_SpWordNet
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Specificity measured as WordNet graph exp(-distance), i.e. 1 is perfect match, 1/e is very specific, ..., 1/e^4 is already very non-specific

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_LATQNoWordNet
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Question LAT has no derivable WordNet LATs.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_LATANoWordNet
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Answer LAT has no derivable WordNet LATs.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_TyCorSpQHit
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Question LAT is direct hypernyme of the answer LAT.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_TyCorSpAHit
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Answer LAT is direct hypernyme of the question LAT.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_TyCorANE
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Matched answer LAT has been generated by answer named entity type.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_TyCorADBp
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Matched answer LAT has been generated by DBpedia rdf:type of the concept.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_TyCorAQuantity
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Matched answer LAT has been generated by quantity statement.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_TyCorAQuantityCD
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Matched answer LAT has been generated by numerical quantity statement.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_TyCorAWnInstance
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Matched answer LAT has been generated by Wordnet instance-of relation to the concept in focus.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_TyCorADBpRelation
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Matched answer LAT has been generated by a DBpedia property.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_TyCorPassageSp
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Nearby match of a question LAT within the answer-bearing passage; this value carries the specificity of the question LAT, weighed by the word exp-inverse-distance from the answer (see below).

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_TyCorPassageDist
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Nearby match of a question LAT within the answer-bearing passage; this value carries exp-inverse-distance in characters between the LAT word and the answer segment, with 1 being that the LAT is one of the answer words or just nearby. The value is weighed by the question LAT specificity.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_TyCorPassageInside
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Nearby match of a question LAT within the answer-bearing passage; this value is 1.0 if the LAT word match is actually within the answer. The value is weighed by the question LAT specificity.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_SimpleScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: A score as determined by our good old original simple scoring routine that uses just a handful of naive features.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_LATNE
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Boolean value whether we generated a LAT that is the kind of named entity recognized.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_LATDBpType
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Boolean value whether we generated a LAT that is the kind of named entity recognized.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_LATQuantity
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Boolean value whether we generated a LAT based on seeing a quantity statement.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_LATQuantityCD
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Boolean value whether we generated a LAT based on seeing a concrete numeric quantity.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_LATWnInstance
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Boolean value whether we generated a LAT that is the other side of a Wordnet instance-of relation.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_LATDBpRelation
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Boolean value whether we generated a LAT that is a DBpedia property name.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOMatchScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of non-conceptual clues that are syntactically equivalent to this answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOPrefixedScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of non-conceptual clues that are syntactic prefixes of this answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOPrefixingScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of non-conceptual clues that this answer is a syntactic prefix of.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOSuffixedScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of non-conceptual clues that are syntactic suffixes of this answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOSuffixingScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of non-conceptual clues that this answer is a syntactic suffix of.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOSubstredScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of non-conceptual clues that are syntactic substrings of this answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOSubstringScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of non-conceptual clues that this answer is a syntactic substring of.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOMetaMatchScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of non-conceptual clues that either prefix or suffix this answer if both happens.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOCMatchScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of conceptual clues that are syntactically equivalent to this answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOCPrefixedScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of conceptual clues that are syntactic prefixes of this answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOCPrefixingScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of conceptual clues that this answer is a syntactic prefix of.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOCSuffixedScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of conceptual clues that are syntactic suffixes of this answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOCSuffixingScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of conceptual clues that this answer is a syntactic suffix of.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOCSubstredScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of conceptual clues that are syntactic substrings of this answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOCSubstringScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of conceptual clues that this answer is a syntactic substring of.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_ClOCMetaMatchScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Clue Overlap): #of conceptual clues that either prefix or suffix this answer if both happens.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_EvDPrefixedScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Evidence Diffusion): Sum of scores of all answers that are syntactic prefixes of this answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_EvDPrefixingScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Evidence Diffusion): Sum of scores of all answers that this answer is a syntactic prefix of.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_EvDSuffixedScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Evidence Diffusion): Sum of scores of all answers that are syntactic suffixes of this answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_EvDSuffixingScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Evidence Diffusion): Sum of scores of all answers that this answer is a syntactic suffix of.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_EvDSubstredScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Evidence Diffusion): Sum of scores of all answers that are syntactic substrings of this answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_EvDSubstringScore
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature (Evidence Diffusion): Sum of scores of all answers that this answer is a syntactic substring of.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_TopAnswer
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Boolean value whether we are one of the top answers selected by earlier scoring.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_SolrHitsEv
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Unbounded integer representing the number of search hits for question + answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_SolrAHitsEv
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Unbounded integer representing the number of search hits for answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_SolrHitsANormEv
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Unbounded integer representing the number of search hits for question + answer, normalized by number of search hits for just the answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_SolrMaxScoreEv
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Unbounded float representing the maximum score among search hits for question + answer.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_SolrHitsMaxScoreEv
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Unbounded float representing SolrHitsEv * SolrMaxScoreEv.

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_Phase0Score
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Confidence computed in phase 0 (for use by next phases).

typeDescription.name: cz.brmlab.yodaqa.model.CandidateAnswer.AF_Phase1Score
typeDescription.description: Answer Feature: Confidence computed in phase 1 (for use by next phases).
